title: THE STAFF IS WHY I'D RETURN...AGAI AND AGAIN AND AGAIN!
text: Yep...the staff, from the greeting of the Doorman to the Reception to the Housekeeper to the restaurant Server was OUTSTANDING.. Having been in the hotel business, I tend to be more aware of service and facilities than others...and, particular. The ALLERTON will be my choice for all my visits to Chicago...The workout rooms are better than any I've seen..Jerome and Nadeem are outstanding and certainly go the extra mile with teriffic attitudes...Great value, great staff and THE place to stay....
